name: No way out (itch) (vmlobo, Fizbo)
description:
This game is a sumission for 2019's Community Game Jam.

The goal is simple, explore the dungeon and try to find a way out, but remember, the game is a liar! (The third level is nwinnable as the game is still under development)

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse click to light your way.

Developed by:

Vitor Lobo (https://vmlobo.itch.io/)

Alvaro Teles(https://fizbo.itch.io/)

On GitHub: https://github.com/vmlobo/CommunityGameJam2019
